September 16, 1957
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
II4 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemen:
Our library is very anxious to have copies of your publication.
Fact Sheet Service Bulletins, Educational Television Research avail¬
able for our students and faculty.
We would appreciate knowing the cost of a subscription to your
publication. If it can be supplied without cost, we would appreci¬
ate your placing the name of this library on your mailing list to
receive two copies of the current numbers as they appear. We would
also be interested in knowing whether any back issues are available.
We shall be grateful for any help you can give us in this
matter.
Very truly yours.
(Mrs.) Ruth M. Funderburk
Serials Librarian
